input.content: You classify video games into a strict JSON schema.
Return a single JSON object for the game title: The Legend of Zelda

display_name.description: The official name of the game with proper punctuation and formatting

normalized_name.description: Lowercase name with all punctuation and special characters removed, spaces replaced with single spaces

summary.description: A 2-3 sentence description of what the game is about and what makes it notable

release_year.description: The year the game was first released (original release, not remasters)

developer.description: The primary development studio that created the game

publisher.description: The company that published/distributed the game

franchise.description: The franchise or series this game belongs to, null if standalone

genre.description: Primary genres that describe the game (e.g., action, RPG, puzzle, strategy)

platforms.description: Platforms the game is available on (e.g., PC, PS5, Xbox Series X, Switch, Mobile)

setting.description: The setting/world of the game (e.g., medieval fantasy, modern day, sci-fi space, post-apocalyptic)

world_type.description: How the game world is structured

multiplayer_type.description: Types of multiplayer available, empty array if single-player only

story_focus.description: How important the story/narrative is to the game

playtime_hours.description: Approximate hours to complete main story/campaign, 0 if endless/no campaign

tags.description: Descriptive tags for gameplay features, themes, and vibes (e.g., crafting, base-building, cozy, challenging, story-driven)

rating.description: Metacritic score (0-100), use 0 if not available or too new

has_microtransactions.description: Whether the game has in-game purchases beyond initial price

is_vr.description: Whether this is a VR-only or VR-required game

has_mods.description: Whether the game has an active modding community or official mod support

requires_online.description: Whether the game requires an internet connection to play

cross_platform.description: Whether players on different platforms can play together

is_remake_or_remaster.description: Whether this is a remake or remaster of an older game

is_dlc.description: Whether this is DLC/expansion content rather than a standalone game

parent_game.description: If is_dlc is true, the name of the base game this is DLC for, otherwise null

procedurally_generated.description: Whether the game features significant procedural generation (levels, worlds, etc.)
